description:
Location: Fully Remote; Portland, OR, San Francisco Bay Area, San Diego, and Boston metro areas preferred.

Drug Hunter, a global leader in information services for preclinical drug discovery, is looking for an ambitious and driven Account Manager.

As a key member of Drug Hunter's Commercial team, you'll identify, qualify, and develop new business, playing a crucial role in driving net revenue growth by fostering the acquisition, growth, and retention of our corporate accounts in the biotech, pharma, non-profit, and investment communities.

Your customer base will include scientists, management, and senior executives. You will work closely with Drug Hunter's scientists, senior managers, and other commercial team members.

Key Responsibilities

  • Support the Commercial team with prospecting, lead qualification, nurturing, quote generation, CRM management, customer support, procurement, customer onboarding and other post-sale activities
  • Manage team engagements with assigned accounts to achieve company goals
  • Develop and maintain outstanding account relationships through effective communication, education, reporting, and support
  • Provide product feedback and commercial intelligence from clients to the rest of the Drug Hunter team for continuous product and process improvement

Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Chemistry, Biology, or a related science
  • One to two years of relevant work experience

Additional Success Factors

  • A team-oriented salesperson, or aspiring salesperson
  • A science background and/or familiar with the drug discovery process
  • A customer-oriented problem-solver who can handle negotiation, terms, procurement, and onboarding
  • An excellent communicator and teacher, able to communicate about scientific solutions to a sophisticated, highly-educated audience
  • Fantastic time-management and organizational skills, with the ability to perform well under pressure

Pay And Perks

Drug Hunter believes its people make it exceptional. Because of this, we're prepared to offer a competitive salary, equity-based compensation, and a wide range of benefits that include healthcare, dental, vision, life insurance, FSA/HSA, critical illness coverage, a 401k and 401k match, and a flexible work schedule. We have a high-growth, team-based company culture that is engaged, and a flexible vacation policy. Drug Hunter is a remote-first company with team members based all over the US.

Sound exciting? Apply today and join us!

Salary: $47000 - $69000 per year
